entry.title: Beauty Synergy (60 tablets) - Tissue Salt Blend for Skin, Hair & Nails
entry.summary:
Vendor: AllisOne
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 92.50

AllisOne's Beauty Synergy (60 tablets) is a carefully formulated blend of tissue salts to rejuvenate ageing skin, counteract skin blemishes, dryness, itchiness or oiliness AND strengthen hair and nails.
  • Enhances skin, hair & nails of all ages and conditions
  • Reduces wrinkles and firms mature skin
  • Supports elastic tissues, collagen and the connective tissues
  • Helps to restore balance and counteract skin blemishes, dryness, itchiness or oiliness
  • Use as a regular skin tonic
  • Economical one tablet dose to combat skin, hair and nail conditions
  • Lactose and sugar free (Vegan and diabetic friendly), suitable for animals, diabetics and children

Ingredients

Beauty Synergy contains the equivalent of six individual tissue salts: Kali Mur D6, Calc Fluor D6, Kali Sulph D6, Nat Phos D6, Silicea D6, Nat Mur D6

Directions for use

Tissue salts may be taken preventatively, as well as for acute and chronic conditions, according to dosage. Use for a period of time in order to achieve results.

  • Adults and Children: Chew or dissolve one tablet in the mouth twice a day
  • Babies & toddlers: One tablet a day (may be crushed & added to food or a bottle) 
  • Acute conditions: Take one tablet every 1/2 hour until symptoms subside.
  • Teenage or Adult Acne: Use Beauty Synergy together with Calc Sulph or Pure Synergy

    Disclaimer: This product has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.
entry.s:tag: AllisOne Wholesale Distrubutor in South Africa

entry.title: Immuno Synergy (60 tablets) - Tissue Salt Blend for Immunity & Allergies
entry.summary:
Vendor: AllisOne
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 92.50

AllisOne's Immuno Synergy (60 tablets) is a carefully formulated blend of tissue salts to boost your immune system and bring relief from seasonal or environmental allergies.

  • Supports the function of the immune and respiratory systems
  • Helps to reduce inflammation and prevent recurrent colds and flu
  • Aids fever blisters, colds and influenza*; rhinitis and sinusitis**; hayfever and postnasal drip***
  • Economical one tablet dose
  • Lactose and sugar free (Vegan and diabetic friendly), suitable for animals, diabetics and children

Consult your practitioner if symptoms persist after *1 week; **3 weeks; ***6 weeks.

Ingredients

Immuno Synergy contains the equivalent of five individual tissue salts: Calc Sulph D6, Silicea D6, Nat Mur D6, Ferrum Phos D6, Kali Mur D6.

Directions for use

Tissue salts may be taken preventatively as well as for acute and chronic conditions, according to dosage.

Adults and Children: Chew or dissolve one tablet in the mouth twice a day
Babies & toddlers: One tablet a day (may be crushed & added to food or in a bottle) 
Acute conditions: Take one tablet every 1/2 hour until symptoms subside.
entry.s:tag: AllisOne Wholesale Distrubutor in South Africa

entry.title: Pure Synergy (60 tablets) - Tissue Salt Blend for Cleanse, Weight-Loss & Renew
entry.summary:
Vendor: AllisOne
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 92.50

AllisOne's Pure Synergy (60 tablets) is a great tonic to help support the digestive, lymphatic, urinary and hepato-biliary systems. Pure Synergy is suitable for those who wish to 'eliminate, counteract and flush'.

  • Assists in coping with metabolic changes during menopause
  • Used in situations of overindulgence of food or alcohol intoxication
  • Eases the symptoms of pimples, acne, boils and abscesses
  • A good tonic for those with metabolic syndrome or diabetes
  • Supports weight-loss programs in conjunction with a balanced diet
  • Economical one tablet dose
  • Lactose and sugar free (Vegan and diabetic friendly), suitable for animals, diabetics and children

Ingredients

Pure Synergy contains the equivalent of five individual tissue salts: Kali Sulph D6, Nat Phos D6, Calc Sulph D6, Silicea D6 and Nat Sulph D6.

Directions for use

Tissue salts may be taken preventatively as well as for acute and chronic conditions, according to dosage.

Adults and Children: Chew or dissolve one tablet in the mouth twice a day
Babies & toddlers: One tablet a day (may be crushed & added to food or in a bottle) 
Acute conditions: Take one tablet every 1/2 hour until symptoms subside
entry.s:tag: AllisOne Wholesale Distrubutor in South Africa

entry.title: Rescue Synergy (60 tablets) - Tissue Salt Blend for Emotional Stability
entry.summary:
Vendor: AllisOne
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 92.50

AllisOne's Rescue Synergy (60 tablets) is carefully formulated to bring you stability and composure and to help ease stress. 

  • Economical one tablet dose to assist in managing everyday stressful situations 
  • Helps to centre your energy, ease emotional upsets, edginess, irritability, moodiness, restlessness, sleeplessness, tearfulness, tension, fatigue, fear and mild anxiety.*
  • A useful tonic during pregnancy for mother and baby
  • Beneficial for hyperactive or exhausted children, students and adults having to cope with a lot of mental and physical demands
  • Lactose and sugar free (Vegan and diabetic friendly), suitable for animals, diabetics and children

*Consult your practitioner if symptoms persist after 3-4 weeks.

Ingredients

Rescue Synergy contains the equivalent of 7 individual tissue salts: Kali Phos D6, Kali Mur D6, Mag Phos D6, Nat Phos D6, Silicea D6, Calc Phos D6 and Nat Mur D6.

Directions for use

Tissue salts may be taken preventatively as well as for acute and chronic conditions, according to dosage.

Adults and Children: Chew or dissolve one tablet in the mouth twice a day
Babies & toddlers: One tablet a day (may be crushed & added to food or in a bottle)
Acute conditions: Take one tablet every 1/2 hour until symptoms subside.
entry.s:tag: AllisOne Wholesale Distrubutor in South Africa

entry.title: Osteo Synergy (180 tablets) - Tissue Salt Blend for Bone & Teeth Support
entry.summary:
Vendor: AllisOne
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 199.50

AllisOne's Osteo Synergy (180 tablets) is a carefully formulated blend of tissue salts to support the function of the musculo-skeletal system and teeth.

  • Facilitates growth and repair of bones, ligaments and supporting muscles
  • Promotes the healing of fractures and assists in the treatment of prediagnosed osteoporosis
  • Used for teething babies and growing pains in children
  • An ideal tonic for pregnancy, growing children and the elderly
  • Economical one tablet dose 
  • Lactose and sugar free (Vegan and diabetic friendly), suitable for animals, diabetics and children

Ingredients

Osteo Synergy contains the equivalent of four individual tissue salts: Calc Fluor D6, Mag Phos D6, Silicea D6 and Calc Phos D6.

Directions for use

Tissue salts may be taken preventatively as well as for acute and chronic conditions, according to dosage.

Adults and Children: Chew or dissolve one tablet in the mouth twice a day
Babies & toddlers: One tablet a day (may be crushed & added to food or in a bottle) 
Acute conditions: Take one tablet every 1/2 hour until symptoms subside.
entry.s:tag: AllisOne Wholesale Distrubutor in South Africa

entry.title: Arthro Synergy (180 tablets) - Tissue Salt Blend for Arthritis & Endurance
entry.summary:
Vendor: AllisOne
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 199.50

AllisOne's Arthro Synergy (180 tablets) is a carefully formulated blend of tissue salts to promote mobility and endurance in athletes and elderly.
  • Reduces inflammation and joint pain and increases mobility
  • An excellent endurance tonic for sportsmen and women - promotes aerobic function of the muscles
  • Helps when muscles and joints become sore and stiff after exertion or excercise
  • Assists in the treatment of prediagnosed arthritis and gout
  • Economical one tablet dose
  • Lactose and sugar free (Vegan and diabetic friendly), suitable for animals, diabetics and children

Ingredients

Arthro Synergy contains the equivalent of five individual tissue salts: Calc Fluor D6, Kali Sulph D6, Nat Phos D6, Silicea D6 and Ferrum Phos D6.

Directions for use

Tissue salts may be taken preventatively, as well as for acute and chronic conditions, according to dosage.

  • Adults and Children: Chew or dissolve one tablet in the mouth twice a day
  • Babies & toddlers: One tablet a day (may be crushed & added to food or a bottle) 
  • Acute conditions: Take one tablet every 1/2 hour until symptoms subside.
  • Sportsmen & Women: Use every 20 - 30 mins, or dissolved in a water bottle and sipped frequently. If prone to muscle cramping, add Mag Phos or Osteo Synergy.

    Disclaimer: This product has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.
entry.s:tag: AllisOne Wholesale Distrubutor in South Africa
